body.p: For you to be able to buy and sell music and manage your music collection on Discogs you need to be registered and have an active account. Accouts are free and by joining the discogs community of contributors you can add your unique items to the database. With more than 11 million unique entries and growing every day, the user-contributed database is the largest, most accurate discography of recorded music available! This section will guide you how you can create an account.

topic.title: How to contribute to the discogs community

ul.li: Find your new favorite musical recording.
Search Discogs for info. If the recording is not in the database...
Add your record to Discogs using the Submission Form
Now other Discogs community members can add it to their Wantlist, Collection, or their Marketplace.
